TABLE.NAME: tool_driprelease
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the driprelease activity course instances.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: modtype
FIELD.COMMENT: the module or other activity type

FIELD.NAME: schedulefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: datetime when last set of activities will be available

FIELD.NAME: sessionlength
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of days over which to add new activiti/ies

FIELD.NAME: activitiespersession
FIELD.COMMENT: Activities per repeated session, e.g. 5 quizzes per week

FIELD.NAME: stayavailable
FIELD.COMMENT: Don't set a until value in restrictions. Activities will stay available at the end of sessions.

FIELD.NAME: hideunselected
FIELD.COMMENT: If a course module is not selected then hide it.

FIELD.NAME: coursemoduleid
FIELD.COMMENT: course module ids that have been selected
